channel.title: Teachings on DGC
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on DGC

item.title: Teaching materials
item.description:
Conservation Biology (UAB 2017, in spanish)

  • Seminar 1 - General ideas and trends on Conservation Biology
  • Seminar 2 - Drivers: Climate change, habitat loss and fragmentation
  • Seminar 3 - Invasive species (with Yolanda Melero)
  • Seminar 4 - Land Stewardship (with Alberto Navarro)

Forest Ecology (UAB 2017, in spanish)

  • Seminar - Age-Structured Population Models

Ecological Modelling (UAB 2015, 2016, in spanish)

  • Seminar - Ecological interactions and community stability

Other courses

  • Full materials of a 10-hour Latex and Zotero crash course imparted at CREAF, 2018
